sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		curinv_cargo_id as string,
		Age_start as string,
		Age_Stop as string,
		hold_start as string,
		hold_stop as string,
		Hold_date as string,
		curinv_cargo_id as string,
		Age_start as string,
		Age_Stop as string,
		hold_start as string,
		hold_stop as string,
		Hold_date as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		cargo_id = curinv_cargo_id,
		age_start = Age_start,
		age_stop = Age_Stop,
		hold_start,
		hold_stop,
		Hold_date
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
